Text: My apologies to those wgo downloaded Practice 3 this week as i did this upload remotely from an iphone and didnt noteice i uploaded the .ts file rather than the converted mkv. file. Shud anyone still want it, let me know. Incidently, The Race & Build Up shud be here with 30 mins guys

Do not ask us that question. Of course we still want it, in fact we wont everything you do because, first some of us have no chance to watch F1 in theirs country, second i personally adore BBC coverage of Formula One literally every single minute and finally as most important we love your's great work and for that million times THANKS, THANKS, THANKS ...

Thanks tonnes for this mate !! 

Keep up the great work !
